verses.verse: <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> was <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he began to <S%H4427>reign;<s%> and he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> - <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

He <S%H6213>did<s%> that which was <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> after the <S%H8441>abominations<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%> whom <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> cast <S%H3423>out<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

For he <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> the high <S%H1116>places<s%> which <S%H3169>Hezekiah<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> had broken <S%H5422>down;<s%> and he reared <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H4196>altars<s%> for the <S%H1168>Baals,<s%> and <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H842>Asheroth,<s%> and <S%H7812>worshiped<s%> all the <S%H6635>army<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> and served <S%H5647>them.<s%>

He <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H4196>altars<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> of which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "My <S%H8034>name<s%> shall be in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%>"
He <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H4196>altars<s%> for all the <S%H6635>army<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky<s%> in the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2691>courts<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

He also <S%H5674>made<s%> his <S%H1121>children<s%> to pass <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H784>fire<s%> in the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2011>Hinnom;<s%> and he practiced <S%H6049>sorcery,<s%> and used <S%H5172>enchantments,<s%> and practiced <S%H3784>sorcery,<s%> and <S%H6213>dealt<s%> with those who had familiar <S%H178>spirits,<s%> and with <S%H3049>wizards:<s%> he <S%H6213>worked<s%> <S%H7235>much<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> to provoke him to <S%H3707>anger.<s%>

He <S%H7760>set<s%> the engraved <S%H6459>image<s%> of the <S%H5566>idol,<s%> which he had <S%H6213>made,<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> of which <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> and to <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> "In this <S%H1004>house,<s%> and in <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> which I have <S%H977>chosen<s%> out of all the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> will I <S%H7760>put<s%> my <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H5865>forever:<s%>

neither will I any <S%H3254>more<s%> <S%H5493>remove<s%> the <S%H7272>foot<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from off the <S%H127>land<s%> which I have <S%H5975>appointed<s%> for your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> only they will <S%H8104>observe<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> all <S%H518>that<s%> I have <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H8451>them,<s%> even all the law and the <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and the <S%H4941>ordinances<s%> given <S%H3027>by<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>"

<S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H8582>seduced<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> so that they <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H7451>more<s%> <S%H8582>evil<s%> than the <S%H1471>nations<s%> whom <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of Israel <S%H3478>did.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> and to his <S%H5971>people;<s%> but they gave no <S%H7181>heed.<s%>

Therefore <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> on them the captains <S%H8269>of<s%> the army <S%H8269>of<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria,<s%> who <S%H3920>took<s%> <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> in <S%H631>chains,<s%> and bound him with <S%H5178>fetters,<s%> and <S%H3212>carried<s%> <S%H631>him<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon.<s%>

When he was in <S%H6887>distress,<s%> he <S%H2470>begged<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> his <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H3665>humbled<s%> himself <S%H3966>greatly<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of his <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

He <S%H6419>prayed<s%> to <S%H6279>him;<s%> and he was entreated by <S%H8085>him,<s%> and heard his <S%H8467>supplication,<s%> and brought him <S%H7725>again<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> into his <S%H4438>kingdom.<s%> Then <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> was <S%H430>God.<s%>

Now after <S%H310>this<s%> he <S%H1129>built<s%> an outer <S%H2346>wall<s%> to the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> on the west <S%H4628>side<s%> of <S%H1521>Gihon,<s%> <S%H935>in<s%> the <S%H5158>valley,<s%> even to the <S%H935>entrance<s%> at the <S%H1709>fish<s%> <S%H8179>gate;<s%> and he <S%H5437>encircled<s%> <S%H6077>Ophel<s%> with <S%H1361>it,<s%> and raised it up to a very great <S%H3966>height:<s%> and he <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H2428>valiant<s%> <S%H8269>captains<s%> in all the <S%H1219>fortified<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>

He took <S%H5493>away<s%> the <S%H5236>foreign<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> and the <S%H5566>idol<s%> out of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and all the <S%H4196>altars<s%> that he had <S%H1129>built<s%> in the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and in <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and <S%H7993>cast<s%> them <S%H2351>out<s%> of the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

He <S%H1129>built<s%> up the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H2076>offered<s%> thereon sacrifices of <S%H8002>peace<s%> <S%H2077>offerings<s%> and of <S%H8426>thanksgiving,<s%> and <S%H559>commanded<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> to <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
<S%H61>Nevertheless<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> still in the high <S%H1116>places,<s%> but only to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> their <S%H430>God.<s%>

Now the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H1697>acts<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> and his <S%H8605>prayer<s%> to his <S%H430>God,<s%> and the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H2374>seers<s%> who <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to him in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H1697>behold,<s%> they are written among the acts of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

His <S%H8605>prayer<s%> <S%H6279>also,<s%> and how God was entreated of <S%H2403>him,<s%> and all his sin and his <S%H4604>trespass,<s%> and the <S%H4725>places<s%> in which he <S%H1129>built<s%> high <S%H1116>places,<s%> and set <S%H5975>up<s%> the <S%H842>Asherim<s%> and the engraved <S%H6456>images,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> he <S%H3665>humbled<s%> <S%H3789>himself:<s%> behold, they are written in the <S%H1697>history<s%> of <S%H2374>Hozai.<s%>

So <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H7901>slept<s%> with his <S%H1>fathers,<s%> and they <S%H6912>buried<s%> him in his own <S%H1004>house:<s%> and <S%H526>Amon<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> reigned in his <S%H4427>place.<s%>

<S%H526>Amon<s%> was <S%H6242>twenty<s%> - <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he began to <S%H4427>reign;<s%> and he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

He <S%H6213>did<s%> that which was <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> as <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> his <S%H1>father;<s%> and <S%H526>Amon<s%> <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> to all the engraved <S%H6456>images<s%> which <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> had <S%H6213>made,<s%> and served <S%H5647>them.<s%>

He <S%H6440>didn't<s%> humble himself before <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> as <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> had <S%H3665>humbled<s%> <S%H526>himself;<s%> but this same Amon <S%H819>trespassed<s%> <S%H7235>more<s%> and <S%H7235>more.<s%>
His <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H7194>conspired<s%> against <S%H4191>him,<s%> and put him to death in his own <S%H1004>house.<s%>

But the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H5221>killed<s%> all those who had <S%H7194>conspired<s%> against <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H526>Amon;<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H4427>made<s%> <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> king in his <S%H4427>place.<s%>
